::Shadow Wing::

She understood him.  She could feel the techno part taking over the organic 
part of her.  She was loosing her edge along with the rest f the Maximals.  
She needed a break. She needed to rekindle the owl in herself. "uh, mind if 
I join you hunting? I proise not to go after the same rabbit that your 
chasing." She smiled slightly.

---Original Message---
From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
Date: Wed Jul 5, 2000 6:48pm
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

Lunarpine looked up at Shadow Wing, he could sense her emotions, like
a mother who failed to protect her eggs from preditors.

"I'm going hunting. I need to get away for a bit. All this
inactivity's dulling my senses. I can see it in the other Maximals,
they've lost thier edge on this planet. We were given these senses to
adapt to this planet, not to colinize it." The thought of technology
winning out over nature sickened him. Maybe being one of this planets
natural creatures for a time distorted the yechnological side of him,
maybe not. Either way the Maximals were inadvertently doing what they
set out to prevent.

"We need to stay sharp Wing, back at the Ark I smelled something,
even the sensors didn't notice. Nobody noticed it except me. If our
leaders rely on technology that much then we'll all end up looking
like the Ark. I for one wouldn't want that."
